# Builders.to

> A members-only project launchpad for builders. Share your work in progress, get feedback from the community, and find your first users.

Builders.to is a community platform where indie hackers, solopreneurs, and developers share their projects at any stage—from idea to launched product. Members can upvote, comment, and provide feedback to help each other succeed.

## Features

- **Project Sharing**: Post your work at any stage (Idea → Building → Beta → Launched)
- **Community Feedback**: Get constructive feedback from fellow builders
- **Upvoting System**: Support projects you love and help them gain visibility
- **Builder Profiles**: Showcase your work and connect with other makers
- **Company Pages**: Create and manage company profiles
- **Local Listings**: Discover builders and services in your area
- **Services Marketplace**: Offer and find builder services
- **Live Streamers**: Discover builders who stream their work

## Public Pages

- `/feed` - Main community feed with recent projects and updates
- `/projects` - Browse all projects shared by the community
- `/companies` - Discover companies built by community members
- `/services` - Marketplace for builder services
- `/local` - Find builders and listings by location
- `/streamers` - Builders who live-stream their work
- `/privacy` - Privacy policy
- `/terms` - Terms of service

## Community

Part of the Builders.to community on X/Twitter: https://x.com/i/communities/1943895831322439993

## Contact

For questions about Builders.to, reach out through the X community or create an account to connect with the team directly.

- Logo: https://builders.to/logo.svg
